txt.en:
'Greetings, Etelä-vieras. I welcome you to Forochel. Would you seek to aid the Lumi-väki? If so, then I have a task for you.

'The Lumi-väki have become masters of this icy realm, using our bone-tipped spears to protect ourselves from the great beasts that threaten us in our hunts. Of course, not every spear lands true. So many spear-heads are lost. However, these spear-heads are quite difficult to make, so the loss of even one is bitter to us.

'If you find any of our spear-heads and bring them to me, you will earn the gratitude of all Lumi-väki.'
'Ah good! You have found some of our spear-heads! We will put these back into use soon!\n\n'I will gladly welcome any more you find.'
'Have you found any of our spear-heads yet? We lose many of them in the hides of the great beasts that we hunt. Perhaps if you defeat one of those beasts you will find a one.'
Juha told you how the Lossoth protect themselves from the aggressive creatures that inhabit Forochel with their bone-tipped spears.
Bring the Lossoth spear-heads to Juha
Juha is at Sûri-kylä and Pynti-peldot in Forochel.\n\nJuha has asked you to bring him any Lossoth spear-heads which you find during your travels.
